name: The Sophia Full length cowl neck dress. Organic cotton hemp.
description:
DESCRIPTION :::

The Full Length Cowl Neck Dress is long and a bit fuller at the bottom giving it a classic shape and beautiful movement. The cowl is very generous in size and a lovely compliment to the simplicity of the dress. Made in organic hemp cotton jersey that is so soft.

COLOR :::

Shown in Berry.

This versatile dress comes in your choice of beautiful saturated colors that I dye for you with my own two hands (with gloves on of course). You will find the color selection in most of the listings.
If you have a specific color request let me know and I will do my best to get it as close for you as possible.
There can be occasional inconsistencies in color due to the dying process. The dying process can also vary slightly from batch to batch. Color may vary according to your browser and settings. 

For a full spectrum of colors that we offer please go to our ~

**COLOR CHART 
gratefulthreadsorganics.com 
or
http://www.gratefulthreadsorganics.com/independent_designer_clothes_and_jewelry_01_colorchart_grateful_threads_organics.html


FABRIC :::

An organic hemp cotton blend jersey that is thicker and heavier. 
Very stretchy and very soft.
Wears in not out.

ORDERING :::

Please be sure to include size, measurements and color choice in the 'Message to Seller' box when completing your order: 
If you have any questions regarding size or color please email me.
Turn around for all garments is approximately 3 weeks.

SIZE CHART :

Measurements are helpful but not imperative ~ A general size chart is listed below, please order closest to your size.


XS (SIZE 2-4) BUST 32-33 WAIST 24-25 HIPS 35-36

SM (SIZE 6-8) BUST 34-35 WAIST 26-27 HIPS 37-38

MED (SIZE 10-12) BUST 36-38 WAIST 28-29 HIPS 39-40

LG (SIZE 14-16) BUST 39-41 WAIST 31-33 HIPS 43-44

XL (SIZE 18) BUST 43 WAIST 35 HIPS 45

SHIPPING :

USPS Priority Mail with Delivery Confirmation. 2-3 day delivery.
Once your item has shipped I will forward a delivery confirmation number to you so that you are able to track your package.
If you would like to purchase insurance for your package please let me know and I will invoice you for it. Insurance is inexpensive and will protect you should your package get lost. 

I cannot be responsible for the package once it has been turned over to the post office.

OTHER STUFF :::

I design clothing for comfort, yoga, playtime, dancing and travel. I am my own best test marketer as I live in this stuff and love it. I'm always working on new designs so if this particular item isn't just what you are looking for go back into the shop and take a look around.

name: The Hecate dress. Organic hemp jersey (stretchy).
description:
DESCRIPTION :::

Hecate. Goddess of the wild places, childbirth and the crossroads. She is associated with magic and witchcraft. This dress is thus named. Super sexy and feminine with side cinches, long lean sleeves and a beautiful drapey neckline.

COLOR :::

Shown in Terracotta.

This powerful dress comes in your choice of beautiful saturated colors that I dye for you with my own two hands (with gloves on of course). You will find the color selection in most of the listings.

name: The Pandora dress. Organic hemp jersey (stretchy). Made to order.
description:
DESCRIPTION :::

The Pandora dress is ultimately feminine. Made in my buttery soft and stretchy organic hemp jersey it gives you a long and lean look. Beautifully draped neckline. This dress is a wonderful layering piece.

COLOR :::

Shown in Chocolate.

This wonderfully feminine dress comes in your choice of beautiful saturated colors that I dye for you with my own two hands (with gloves on of course). You will find the color selection in most of the listings.
If you have a specific color request let me know and I will do my best to get it as close for you as possible.
There can be occasional inconsistencies in color due to the dying process. The dying process can also vary slightly from batch to batch. Color may vary according to your browser and settings.

http://www.gratefulthreadsorganics.com/independent_designer_clothes_and_jewelry_01_colorchart_grateful_threads_organics.html


FABRIC :::

The dress ::
A mid weight certified organic hemp cotton blend jersey. 
Moderately stretch and a slight texture similar to raw silk but softer. 
Wears in not out.

The waisband ::
An organic hemp cotton blend jersey that is thicker and heavier. 
Very stretchy and very soft.
Wears in not out.

name: The Oasis Hooded Cowl Dress in Organic Hemp Jersey. Made to order.
description:

name: White Tara Halter Dress. Organic cotton hemp. Made to order.
description:
DESCRIPTION:::

This sexy low back dress shows off all the work you've been doing in yoga class. The top portion of the dress is made to drape in the front while plunging low in the back. The center waistband is wide and creates a slimming effect and the skirt is long with an A line cut. You really will feel like a goddess.

COLOR :::

Shown in Rain.

This sexy dress comes in your choice of beatuiful saturated colors that I dye for you with my own two hands (with gloves on of course). You will find the color selection in most of the listings.
